comment: This morning it s Enterprise Zone project board . It s more than a project , it s a modern take on our way of life . Bringing forward today s technologies from the ground beneath our feet ... It s also my baby , a project I have led from inception

            :op2 (t2 / take-on-09

            :op3 (b2 / bring-01
                  :ARG1 (t3 / technology)
                  :ARG2 (g / ground

                  :direction (f2 / forward)

                  :time (s / since
